summary: Personal portfolio/profile site for Dr. Shane JC (Simply Shane Designs). Currently updating the hero/intro tidbit block to change 'Dr. Shane J Charbonnet' (line 2) to 'Dr. Shane JC'.
known_issues: Production deployment has been failing with 'Deployment error' on recent attempts.

new_feature_requests.summary: In the hero/intro tidbit block, update the second line — the standalone name display directly beneath 'A Tidbit About Dr. Shane JC' — from 'Dr. Shane J Charbonnet' (or any variant such as 'Dr. Shane J. Charbonnet') to 'Dr. Shane JC'. Only this specific line-2 instance should be changed; all other text in that block (title line, 'Simply Shane Designs (c)sm', tagline, bio paragraph) must remain exactly as-is.
